name: GLCM Texture Analysis
description: Analyzes spatial relationships between pixel intensity levels using Gray Level Co-occurrence Matrix. AI images show smoother textures with higher homogeneity.
algorithm: Gray Level Co-occurrence Matrix (GLCM) + Haralick Features
mechanism: Computes GLCM and extracts contrast, energy, and homogeneity features. AI-generated images have higher homogeneity and energy.
parameters: Levels: 16, Distance: 1, Angle: 0 degrees, Features: contrast/energy/homogeneity
useCase: Detecting overly smooth textures in AI-generated content
